messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Stupid question but I need an answer so..
messages.msgSnippet: ... phil Grace Battista  wrote: The SHQ Spy Division group, my impression is, here we discuss fan work (fic/art) right? Now I ve been
messages.messageBody:
:-D Uh... it would fit both, but I think the reality may be that it's more appropriate to the main discussion list. Opinions? Do you guys want to hear about pro works on this list? (I know most of us are on both lists, but not everyone is... ) Maybe it's enough to say in the link for the database that links to professional works of fiction and art are included on the database?

phil

Grace Battista <wounds@...> wrote:
The SHQ Spy Division group, my impression is, here we discuss fan
work (fic/art) right? Now I've been wondering where to post whether
here or the SHQ group about works that are non-fan... I'm just a
little confused so if someone can please help me out. Guess I just
want to stop thinking each time I post. Thanks.
